name: Fast Rolling
description:
In this game, you have to pass different levels while controlling the ball. Each level contains various obstacles and elements which make the playing process harder.
Obstacles are perfectly varied, both static and dynamic.

The difficulty increases with each new level, various additional factors appear (fire, disappearing platforms, etc.), and also the times of day change (day/night).
The project is well optimized for slower PCs.

Features:
• The control is simple;
• Peculiar graphics;
• Various levels;
• Puzzles.
